Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
GPU |  | Yes
Wireless | 35f5:7922 | Yes
Audio | 1d72:2209 | Yes
Touchpad | 04F3:3238 | Yes
Webcam | 2b7e:c687 | Yes
Fingerprint reader | 10a5:9201 | Needs custom driver
Bluetooth | 35f5:7922 | Yes

This article covers the installation and configuration of Arch Linux on a RedmiBook Pro 15 2023 Ryzen edition laptop. Almost everything seems to work pretty much out the box.

For a general overview of laptop-related articles and recommendations, see Laptop.

sections.title: Fingerprint reader
sections.content: Needs custom driver to work with fprintd

sections.title: S3 sleep / s2idle
sections.content:
S3 sleep is not supported. However, s2idle works out of the box and causes no problems with sleep / hibernation.

If you have trouble with waking up, see AMDGPU#Failure to suspend to RAM.

To get S3 to work, one needs to patch ACPI. You ma experience a white screen after wake up with this patch.

sections.title: Other ACPI issues
sections.content: There is error on startup and amdgpu error is dmesg. But seems like theese errors does not touch functionality.

sections.title: Speakers
sections.content: You can use Lenovo ThinkPad P14s (AMD) Gen 4#Speakers tweak to get better sound.

sections.title: Function keys
sections.content: Additional keys by Xiaomi(Cut, settings, AI) needs DKMS driver.

sections.title: Other
sections.content: Great optimization guide for this notebook
